name: Soulblaze Snowman: The Warrior
description: A snowman modeled after Varesa, complete with her signature hero's mask. It faithfully captures her warmth and approachable spirit, without losing the passion that defines her.\nTo help guests from all across Teyvat relax and have fun, the creator of Jade Pitching designed this charming little companion. Though the snows of Dragonspine may be harsh, its presence brings a subtle warmth that lingers.
